sentences.english: The rain fell in torrents, insomuch that the soldiers were often ankle-deep in water.
sentences.chinese: 大雨倾盆，因而士兵们时时需涉水而行。

sentences.english: They treated their servants well, but expected them always to know their place.
sentences.chinese: 他们对待仆人不坏，但期望他们时时安分守己。

sentences.english: Always pay attention to safety, prevent accidents everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 时时注意安全，处处预防事故。

sentences.english: But you are right we can't tell the truth all the time.
sentences.chinese: 但是对的，我们不可能时时都讲真话。

sentences.english: Keep the mind pure and undefiled. Remain calm and serene always.
sentences.chinese: 守住清净无为的心，让心时时寂静。

sentences.english: The success, is in each individual heart the loftiest dream.
sentences.chinese: 古今中外，无人不在时时刻刻做着成功的梦想。

sentences.english: I don’t want often to shed tears over that.
Mixing charm with her trademark sarcasm, she is always full of surprises.
sentences.chinese: 她的讽刺焕发着独特的魅力，时时刻刻充满了惊喜。

sentences.english: The power of the mind's creativity depends on the constant stimulation and encouragements.
sentences.chinese: 心灵的创造力是需要被时时的激发的。

sentences.english: I'm thinking of you every minute.
Because the mind, like the ocean waves, is constantly arising and ebbing.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们这念心时时刻刻在起波浪。

sentences.english: But he still looks at the boy every minute without eating and drinking.
sentences.chinese: 不过他仍然时时刻刻不吃不喝地盯着那个男子。

sentences.english: So we should always take good care of our minds.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们要时时照顾好我们这一念心。

sentences.english: Always remember that here is Journey to Guanyin urged him to refrain from eating demon Ende.
sentences.chinese: 这里八戒是时时记得观音曾劝他不要为妖吃人的恩德。

sentences.english: Developers must write programmer tests all the time.
sentences.chinese: 开发人员必须时时刻刻都要编写程序员测试。

sentences.english: It keepsdistressing me and makes me try to think about myself.
sentences.chinese: 我因此也时时煞了苦痛，努力的要想到我自己。

definition: to be careful/to pay attention to
at any time/at all times/at the right time
